skills.name: SURVEY
desc: • Deal physical damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Steal Fury from enemy.
• Stuns the enemy if they are suffering from damage over time effects.

skills.name: SIREN
desc: • Grant Attack Up to all allies for 2 turns.
• Heal each ally for 15% of their MAX HP.
• Grant Reflect Shield to all allies for 2 turns
